title: Boris Johnson to set out England's final Covid lockdown easing
content:
1. Boris Johnson to set out England's final Covid lockdown easing  BBC News
  2. Boris Johnson will end UK mask mandate on July 19 'Freedom Day'  New York Post
  3. England may soon abandon coronavirus mask requirements, minister says  Arab News
  4. Editorial: Boris Johnson is urging us to take 'personal responsibility' over Covid-19 – so should the government  The Independent
  5. UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson is 'taking on the virus of cancel culture'  Sky News Australia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Boris Johnson to set out England's final Covid lockdown easing  BBC News
Boris Johnson will end UK mask mandate on July 19 'Freedom Day'  New York Post 
England may soon abandon coronavirus mask requirements, minister says  Arab News
Editorial: Boris Johnson is urging us to take 'personal responsibility' over Covid-19 – so should the government  The Independent
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson is 'taking on the virus of cancel culture'  Sky News Australia
